DOC.brief_summary: Many patient undergo surgery use naturopathic drug , include fish oil . Fish oil report increase bleeding patient inhibit platelet aggregation prolong clot formation time . The Swedish Medical Products Agency recommend patient stop take naturopathic medicine include fish oil two week prior plan surgery . The aim study examine effect fish oil give healthy volunteer use point care coagulation assessment flow dependent Cellix instrument intake fish oil .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Fish Oil Platelet Function Coagulation
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy volunteer give maximum dose fish oil 7 day . Blood sample collect immediately 7 day intake analysed use point care coagulation assessment instrument flow dependent platelet aggregation use microfluid flow control system ( Cellix ) . For point care coagulation assessment multiple electrode platelet aggregometer Multiplate , viscoelastic rotational thromboelastometers ROTEM Sonoclot use . Flow cytometry may also utilize .
DOC.criteria: Non smoke healthy volunteer write consent participate Medication affect coagulation platelet within 14 day priori inclusion
